title: Profile/header branding update to 'Tayari' with PSC-preparation avatar

requirements.summary: Replace any occurrence of the phrase "design by build tayari" with the exact header/title text "Tayari" in the profile/header area.
acceptanceCriteria: The UI no longer displays the text "design by build tayari" anywhere in the app UI.
The affected header/title renders exactly "Tayari" (case-sensitive) with no additional prefix/suffix text.

file_operations.description: Update the profile/header title copy so it renders exactly "Tayari" and ensure any legacy phrase "design by build tayari" is not present in this header area.

Audit and remove/replace any legacy branding text matching "design by build tayari" to ensure the phrase is not displayed anywhere in the UI (keep changes limited to the requested profile/header branding scope).

requirements.summary: Add a PSC-preparation themed static profile avatar image to the profile/header area with sensible circular/rounded cropping and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: A new static image asset representing a PSC-preparation scene is added under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used as the profile image in the profile/header area.
The profile image renders consistently without layout overflow on common mobile widths.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static PSC-preparation illustration asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/psc-profile.dim_512x512.png.

Render the new PSC-preparation profile avatar in the header/profile area (use a circular or rounded avatar crop and ensure it does not overflow on common mobile widths), using the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/psc-profile.dim_512x512.png.

requirements.summary: Reference the PSC-preparation profile image strictly as a static frontend asset via a stable /assets/generated/... path (no backend fetching).
acceptanceCriteria: The profile UI references the image via a /assets/generated/... URL.
No backend APIs or canister calls are introduced for serving the profile image.

file_operations.description: Ensure the profile/header avatar references the asset via the stable static URL path /assets/generated/psc-profile.dim_512x512.png and does not introduce any backend/canister calls for image loading.
